name: ahsanjaved001-portfolio
description: Ahsan Javed's Portfolio - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:frontend && npm run format:check:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.check-all: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run build:backend && firebase deploy --only functions

author: Ahsan Javed
